conbody.p: Java configuration optionsData Collector environment fileData CollectorJava configuration optionsSDC_ROOT_CLASSPATHJava configuration optionSDC_JAVA_OPTSJava configuration optionYou can edit the environment file to add or update Java configuration options.
If you start the manually, use the following file: <SDCinstalldir>/libexec/sdc-env.sh
If you start the as a service, use the following file: <SDCinstalldir>/libexec/sdcd-env.sh

The environment configuration file includes the following Java configuration options:
SDC_ROOT_CLASSPATH Defines the path to jar files to be added to the root classloader. Use for components that must be in the root classloader, such as Snappy.
SDC_JAVA_OPTS Defines additional Java configuration options for the . By default, this property includes the heap size for the .
